pages.title: Egg Laying Wooly Pig
pages.text: Your whole "creating life" thing has worked rather mixed so far. But slowly you feel you are able to move something.$(br2)Creating life from nothing is a difficult thing, but combining existing knowledge? You feel a bit like Frankenstein himself.$(br)$(italic)Is that a good thing? Bad? You are not sure at all.

pages.title: Fusing a Head
pages.text: What would your creation like to eat? It's relevant, for... $(l:creating_life/memories)reasons$().

pages.title: The Creature
pages.text: Able to be $(thing)sheared$() and $(thing)milked$(), while also $(thing)laying eggs$().
